name: UKCorePreferredContactMethod
title: UK Core Preferred Contact Method
description: A set of codes to identify the preferred contact method of a patient, contact or related person. These codes and their descriptions represent common communication methods and are originally sourced from the removed [NHS Data Dictionary PreferredContactMethod](https://data.developer.nhs.uk/dms/mim/3.1.09/Vocabulary/PreferredContactMethod.htm) list. SMS added 10/10/2023 for Galleri / Grail usage with a sequential code ID.
